situation.title: eRouška - problems
situation.meta_description: eRouška (mobile app) reports a risky contact, but I wasn't anywhere that day.

content.processed:
eRouška (mobile app) reports a risky contact, but I wasn't anywhere that day

If you are absolutely sure that you have not been anywhere, not even by car (eRouška app could have been installed, for example, by the driver next to you in a column), first check that you have the current version installed. It may be an eRouška app error. Unfortunately, this cannot be completely prevented, as with any other location-based application. Your error might not be a single event, we recomend having a look at the social networks of eRouška. Possibly the team already knows about the error and are working on it. If that doesn't help, contact the eRouška team at info@erouska.cz.

related_situations.title: SMS with a fake positive result
